course_title: Family/Emergency Nurse Practitioner I: Clinical Decision-Making in Emergency Care
course_description: Students evaluate and manage patients with wellness through acute episodic, urgent & emergent conditions in primary & emergency settings. Emphasis is on clinical decision-making, interdisciplinary communication, interpreting laboratory/radiologic/diagnostic tests and advanced practice skills.
prerequisites: NRSG 544 and NRSG 549 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
schedule_location:
T 1pm-4:50pm in Nursing School - 110
F 8am-12pm in Nursing School - 110
